meanings.definition: To go before as an indication of what is to follow.
meanings.sent1: The dark clouds forerun the storm.
meanings.sent2: The robin's song foreruns the sunrise every morning.
meanings.sent3: The smell of burnt toast foreruns my brother's failed attempts at cooking.
meanings.sent4: The distant sound of thunder foreruns the approaching storm.
meanings.sent5: The sudden drop in temperature foreruns the arrival of winter.

meanings.definition: To precede in time; to come before.
meanings.sent1: The announcement foreruns the start of the event.
meanings.sent2: The early morning light foreruns the busy day ahead.
meanings.sent3: The smell of fresh coffee foreruns the morning rush at the cafe.
meanings.sent4: The first snowflakes forerun the arrival of winter.
meanings.sent5: The chirping of birds foreruns the break of dawn.
